name: SPEED COURT
description:
SPEED COURT is a game about quick and arbitrary decision making.

In SPEED COURT, there is no time for tedious tasks like reviewing evidence, or waiting for juries to decide verdicts. You(Judge), must decide someone fate by quickly reviewing their NAME, CRIME, and FACE, then hit F(for Freedom) or J(for Justice)

Please review the SPEED COURT[Official Guidebook®] within -[HELP]- on the
main menu.

- Fullscreen is a bit broken

(there is a minigame on the main menu, hint: RGB)

Thanks for viewing.

This game was submitted for the Jam portion of LD34.
